PAD.synopsis: Character interacts with a pile of pet collars.Different reaction depending on whether the user has read the missing pet posters before or not.
PAD.how_to_trigger: Click on |Pile of Pet Collars - STUB| - S_TWN_MissingPetsCollarsPile - b7680bb0-4a59-4b66-ad76-f9d332265b9a - (-111 25 -47)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The synopsis for the 'PAD' session notes that the character’s reaction changes based on whether the user has previously read the missing pet posters. This implies an ordering constraint: if there is a session (for example, a 'Missing Pet Posters' session) that provides that background information, then it must precede the triggering of 'PAD'. Although the input only lists the 'PAD' session, the dependency on knowing about the missing pet posters serves as an implicit ordering rule. There is no evidence of mutually exclusive sessions.

PAD_0.speaker: Player
PAD_0.text: 'Rascal.'? 'Jagoda.'? All these collars belonged to pets.

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: Blood-stained collars? Guess I know what happened to all those missing pets.
